text:
EQE | iOS Reverse Engineer, LuaJIT Engineer | Remote

We are creating a systemwide equalizer solution for all platforms, starting with jailbroken iOS. Looking for engineers who are proficient in reverse engineering iOS (specifically mediaserverd, SpringBoard, and AudioToolbox), and for somebody experienced in LuaJIT. Someone with experience in both would be a huge plus. Remote only.

rweichler@gmail.com
